metadata.windows-startup-script-cmd: winrm quickconfig -quiet & net user /add cirrus & net localgroup administrators cirrus /add & netsh advfirewall firewall set rule name="Windows Remote Management (HTTP-In)" profile=public new remoteip=any & winrm set winrm/config/service @{AllowUnencrypted="true"} & winrm set winrm/config/service/auth @{Basic="true"} & powershell.exe -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Set-ExecutionPolicy -ExecutionPolicy bypass -Force"
